thread.title: Little Guys and Big Trading Firms Square Off in Bitcoin Futures Arena

author: Alexander Osipovich
title: Little Guys and Big Trading Firms Square Off in Bitcoin Futures Arena
text:
Small investors are betting that bitcoinâ€™s price will rise, while hedge funds and other large traders are betting it will fall.
That is the pattern rapidly emerging after four weeks of trading in the first U.S. bitcoin futures market, launched last month by Cboe Global Markets Inc. Futures are a type of contract that enables traders to wager whether the future price of an underlying asset will rise or fall.
